title: GA Technologies Expands ITANDI BB with New Advanced Options for Real Estate Agents
text:
Stay Ahead of the Market:
- Discover outperforming stocks and invest smarter with
[Top Smart Score Stocks](https://www.tipranks.com/screener/top-smart-score-stocks) - Filter, analyze, and streamline your search for investment opportunities using

GA technologies Co., Ltd. ( [(JP:3491)](https://www.tipranks.com/stocks/jp:3491) ) has provided an update.
GA technologies Co., Ltd. announced that its subsidiary ITANDI Inc. will launch Additional Advanced Options for its ITANDI BB real estate agent site in the coming spring. These new features, which will be available for a fee, are designed to improve operational efficiency for real estate agents by offering functionalities like a Customized Search Function and Floor Plan Modification. ITANDI BB, which has been widely adopted with a high usage rate among brokerage firms, aims to further solidify its position as a key tool in the real estate industry. The introduction of these advanced options reflects ITANDI’s commitment to evolving as an infrastructure company that supports the real estate sector with high-utility technological services.
More about GA technologies Co., Ltd.
GA technologies Co., Ltd. operates in the real estate technology industry, primarily focusing on facilitating real estate transactions through its subsidiary ITANDI Inc. ITANDI offers services like ITANDI BB, a real-time website for real estate agents that enhances transaction efficiency and reduces vacancy risks, and ITANDI BB+, a suite of digital services for rental operations.
YTD Price Performance: -6.95%
Average Trading Volume: 265,018
Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Sell
Current Market Cap: Yen53.34B
